citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 06-
APR-22.
I arrived at 10:30am and knocked on the door of the home and there was no response. At 10:34am I called the licensee's
phone and left a message. I encountered a kennel employee who said that the licensee was traveling and would not be
home until late afternoon. The employee could not assist a complete inspection process.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 06-
APR-22. 
I arrived at 10:30am and knocked on the door of the home and there was no response.  At 10:34am I called the licensee's 
phone and left a message.  I encountered a kennel employee who said that the licensee was traveling and would not be 
home until late afternoon.  The employee could not assist a complete inspection process. 
 
 
 
End Section
